name: Neato Veto
description: If you think being president is easy, think again pal. It's easier! At least in this super simple presidential simulator, where the fate of an entire (fictional) nation is determined by 2 little buttons. (Actually the buttons are quite big. Bigger is better.)  Assuming you're not a monster who will immediately raze the nation to the ground, you may learn something about yourself by seeing what really matters to you as a leader.
